title: Manganinnie
creator_credit: Tasmanian Film Corporation, Gilda Baracchi, John Honey, Robert Hynard, Ross Hamilton and Daphne Crooks
brief_description: Manganinnie, fleeing the Aboriginal genocide of 1830 in Tasmania, rescues a tiny lost white child. Together they find compassion, love and a bond that delivers them from desperation, loneliness and the terror of pursuit. Based on the novel by Beth Roberts with music by Peter Sculthorpe and a script by Ken Kelso.
